pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Tuesday, March 28, 2023 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

10:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend Question Period.

3:50 p.m. The Prime Minister and the Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance, Chrystia Freeland, will participate in a photo opportunity, prior to tabling Budget 2023.

Third floor foyer
West Block
Parliament Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media wishing to cover the event must be accredited with the Parliamentary Press Gallery.

4:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the Budget Speech, to be delivered by the Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance, Chrystia Freeland, in the House of Commons.
